blogs.title: Portfolio Website Built!
blogs.body: I finally built and published a portfolio page for all of my projects and work. While this portfolio is just a start, I hope to continually improve how it handles data and updates.

blogs.title: Added my Github Projects
blogs.body: I have added a small collection of my personal projects to this portfolio. Feel free to take a look!

blogs.title: New About Me
blogs.body: The Profile section has been updated to contain a little bit more information about myself.

projects.title: Application Tool Kit
projects.body:
Status - In Development

A flexible toolkit platform designed to help streamline web application input and output.

projects.title: Web Boiler Plate
projects.body:
Status - Release v1.0.0

An extremely simple web boiler plate using Webpack, React, and Redux. It contains a demo application that makes use of both Thunk and Saga as middlewear for Redux.

projects.title: JavaScript ECS
projects.body:
Status - In Development

An entity component system made entirely in JavaScript. Being designed with system pipelines in mind, it will be fully modular upon release.

projects.title: Particle Playground
projects.body:
Status - In Development

A fun project designed to test my current JavaScript ECS repository performance. This project utilizes the HTML5 canvas element and the '2d' canvas context.

projects.title: API Boiler Plate
projects.body:
Status - In Development

Designed to streamline the development of small applications that require CRUD operations as well as flexible data interfaces.
